text: Bhim Singh (17 August 1941 â€“ 31 May 2022) was an Indian politician, activist, lawyer and author. He was the founder, President and Chief Patron of the Jammu and Kashmir National Panthers Party (JKNPP). He was a member of the Lok Sabha for a short time in 1988. He was a member of the Jammu and Kashmir Legislative Assembly from 1977 until 1987. Singh was born in Ramnagar, then-British Raj. Until his death, Singh was seen as a potential candidate for President or Vice President of India in the 2022 elections. Singh died on 31 May 2022 from a long-illness at his home in Jammu, India at aged 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Indian lawyers Category:Indian academics Category:Indian writers Category:Politicians from Jammu and Kashmir
title: Bhim Singh (politician)
